messages.content:
Create a music list page that displays the songs created by "handyc". This is an infinite scroll grid that displays an image for each song and a player beneath it. Get the list of songs from https://studio-api.prod.suno.com/api/profiles/ordinaryinterests?page=1&playlists_sort_by=upvote_count&clips_sort_by=created_at  Increate the page number until ".clips" json is empty. Use ".clips.[].audio_url" for the player and
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
